code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(_ref){let{style}=_ref;useEffect(()=>{const letters="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ";let interval=null;let isOriginal=true;const firstNameElement=document.querySelector(".first-name");firstNameElement.onmouseover=event=>{let iteration=0;const originalName="garrettaudet.com";const fullName="garrett audet";const targetText=isOriginal?fullName:originalName;clearInterval(interval);interval=setInterval(()=>{event.target.innerText=targetText.split("").map((letter,index)=>{if(index<iteration){return targetText[index];}return letters[Math.floor(Math.random()*26)];}).join("");if(iteration>=targetText.length){clearInterval(interval);isOriginal=!isOriginal;}iteration+=1/3;},30);};return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",style:style,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header-left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"first-name","data-value":"garrettaudet.com",children:"garrettaudet.com"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/experience",children:"Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://garrett-audet.medium.com/",children:"Writing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/experience#contact",children:"Contact"})]})]});}export default Header;
